resources.string: adb [-s < specific device>] shell am broadcast -a send.mock [-e lat <latitude>] [-e lon <longitude>] [-e alt <altitude>] [-e accurate <accurate>] [-e recency <recency>] [-e type <gps|network>]
adb shell am broadcast -a send.mock -e lat 15.3 -e lon 99
TEST YOU CAN SIGNAL A MOCK LOACTION
